As I mentioned in an earlier post, Jenny wanted to find a better placeholder name. I'm not sure what to call this--it's neither a nom de plume nor a nom de guerre, and I don't want to call it an alias or moniker. We don't plan for it to carry over into nickname status once the baby is born. I asked my brother Luke, and he suggested Sunflower. Jenny liked it, so that's what I'll be using. You might notice a previous post where I already gave it a try.
